trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio Solution Explorer, expand the **Controllers** folder in the mobile service project.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio Solution Explorer, expand the **Controllers** folder in the mobile service project.

trans-unit.source: Open TodoItemController.cs and update the `PostTodoItem` method definition with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Open TodoItemController.cs and update the `PostTodoItem` method definition with the following code:

trans-unit.source: This code sends a push notification (with the text of the inserted item) after inserting a todo item.
trans-unit.target: This code sends a push notification (with the text of the inserted item) after inserting a todo item.

trans-unit.source: In the event of an error, the code will add an error log entry which is viewable on the **Logs** tab of the mobile service in the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: In the event of an error, the code will add an error log entry which is viewable on the **Logs** tab of the mobile service in the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use template notifications to send a single push notification to clients on multiple platforms.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE] You can use template notifications to send a single push notification to clients on multiple platforms.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Supporting multiple device platforms from a single mobile service](../articles/mobile-services-how-to-use-multiple-clients-single-service.md#push).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Supporting multiple device platforms from a single mobile service](../articles/mobile-services-how-to-use-multiple-clients-single-service.md#push).

trans-unit.source: Republish the mobile service project to Azure.
trans-unit.target: Republish the mobile service project to Azure.
